pageContext.claim: “We've been trying to get verifications of signatures in Fulton County, they won't let us do it. The only reason they won't is because we'll find things in the hundreds of thousands. Why wouldn't they let us verify signatures in Fulton County, which is known for being very corrupt? They won't do it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is making up numbers here. There were only about 147,000 absentee ballots cast in Fulton County, making it impossible to have “hundreds of thousands” of forged signatures.
